sections.heading: of need, defined.Certificate of need means a written authorization by the department for a person to implement the project under review

sections.text:
71-5803.03.Certificate of need, defined.

Certificate of need means a written authorization by the department for a person to implement the project under review.

SourceLaws 1979, LB 172, § 6;R.S.1943, (1996), § 71-5806;Laws 1997, LB 798, § 7.
